Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.thrift

Interface MetricsThriftServerSource

All Superinterfaces:
BaseSource, ExceptionTrackingSource, JvmPauseMonitorSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
MetricsThriftServerSourceImpl
@Private public interface MetricsThriftServerSource extends ExceptionTrackingSource, JvmPauseMonitorSource
Interface of a class that will export metrics about Thrift to hadoop's metrics2.
